department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Request for Proposal for Rolls AGM VRLA Solar Batteries
description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services is requesting proposals for Rolls AGM VRLA Solar Batteries.
full_summary:
## Title: 5P123-230124 - Rolls AGM VRLA Solar Batteries
## Reference Number: WS4445170414-Doc4445321827
## Solicitation Number: WS4445170414
## Publication Date: February 15, 2024
## Closing Date: March 1, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified suppliers to submit a proposal for the provision of Rolls AGM VRLA Solar Batteries.

**Notification Details:**
 Solicitation number: WS4445170414
 Reference number: WS4445170414-Doc4445321827
 Type of notification: Request for Proposal
 Status: Expired

**Procurement Category:**
 * Category: GD
 * Procurement method: Competitive - Open bidding

 **Contracting Authority:**
 Minister of Public Works and Government Services
 Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
 Gatineau, Quebec
 Canada K1A 0S5

**End-User Entity:**
 Parks Canada Agency (PC)
 30 Victoria Street
 Gatineau, Quebec
 Canada J8X 0B3

**Contact Information:**
 Tara Sheppard
 Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
 tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Technical Requirements:**
 The successful supplier shall provide Rolls AGM VRLA Solar Batteries, conforming to the specifications outlined in the solicitation document.

**Period of Performance:**
 None specified

**Trade Agreements:**
 Supplies will be procured under the terms of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions of Opportunity:**
 None specified

**Regions of Delivery:**
 Nova Scotia, Canada

**Timeline:**
 A Proposal Question Period will open on February 15, 2024, and will close on March 1, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST. All Suppliers shall ensure their submissions are received prior to the closing time.

**Notice URL:**
 https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18805890?extsite=MTg4MDU4OTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

*Note: All dates and times specified in this notice are in Eastern Standard Time (EST). Suppliers are advised to review and adhere
